description: This table stores unique identifiers for each of a patient's Near-Field Communication (NFC) devices.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DEVICE_IDENT
columns.description: A unique identifier for a specific NFC tag.

columns.name: DEVICE_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
An action taken on a specific NFC device (DEVICE_IDENT).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Assigned


Removed

columns.name: ACTION_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the instant at which an action (DEVICE_ACTION_C) was taken on an NFC device (DEVICE_IDENT).

columns.name: NFC_USER_ID
columns.description: The record ID of the user who performed an action (DEVICE_ACTION_C) on an NFC device (DEVICE_IDENT).
